text: Moominiiney isin Nabiî luk awqe wayteeniih kaa qokle wayteenik, toysa nummah koroosite mari Makkak kaa yeyyeeqe waqdi Yalli kaa qokleh, usuk nammayak nammeyhaytuh anuk ken nammay gablal suge waqdiy usuk isi kataysa Aboobakarak marookitin diggah Yalli nê luk yanik kaak iyye, tokkel Yalli isi farmoytih lubbil isi xaquk satta oobiseeh isin able waytan qandet kaa maqarroyse, Yalli koroosite marih qangara bursuuseeh guba tet ciggiiliseeh Yallih qangaray “laa ilaaha illalla” kinni is iro raqta, Yalli mayso-li, naggaara
